paper_abstract: As RFID-tagged systems become ubiquitous, the acceptance of this technology by the general public necessitates addressing related security/privacy issues. The past six years have seen an increasing number of publications in this direction, specifically using cryptographic approaches. We consider a stream of publications among these that consider mutual authentication of tag and reader, and identify some existing vulnerabilities. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
